UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user account within the Vision-AI Clean Madurai application. Stores personal details and serves as the anchor for user-submitted complaints.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

name.description: The full name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user, used for contact and potentially notifications.

contactNumber.description: The contact phone number of the user.

role.description: The role of the user within the system.

workerId.description: Official badge or employee ID for users with the worker role.

registeredDateTime.description: The date and time when the user's profile was created.

Complaint.title: Complaint
Complaint.description: Represents a waste complaint submitted by a user, including details, location, uploaded images, and AI analysis results.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Complaint entity.

userId.description: Reference to UserProfile. Identifies the user who submitted this complaint.

description.description: A detailed textual description of the waste and environmental concern provided by the user.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude coordinate of the waste location.

longitude.description: The geographic longitude coordinate of the waste location.

imageUrls.description: An array of URLs pointing to the images of the waste uploaded by the user.

submissionDateTime.description: The date and time when the complaint was initially submitted.

status.description: The current processing status of the complaint.

wasteDetected.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the AI analysis detected waste.

wasteType.description: The classification of the detected waste type by the AI.

severity.description: The severity level of the waste determined by the AI.

analysisDateTime.description: The date and time when the AI analysis was completed.

resolvedDateTime.description: The date and time when the complaint was marked as resolved.

definition.description: Stores individual user profiles secured by path-based ownership.
Flat collection of waste reports, secured by a denormalized 'userId' field.
